ygData.subject: Re: Musical Brothers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Orchestra sighed. See, I came to this planet with my brothers.  I landed inside this volcano, and when I came out of my pod, I couldn t see my brothers

::Orchestra::

       Orchestra sighed.

        "See, I came to this planet with my brothers.  I landed inside this
volcano, and when I came out of my pod, I couldn't see my brothers anywhere.
Before I go any further, my brothers are named Composer and Symphony.  We
were supposed to be together, but somehow we got separated.  So I thought,
that maybe I should join a faction, and if I ever find my brothers, I can
make them join my faction and we can be together like we are supposed to,"
He explained.
